name: Smouldimp
description: A mischievous blob of living magma with a playful personality. It can reshape its molten body and leaves trails of fire wherever it goes.

ability.name: Molten Body
ability.description: Contact moves burn the attacker. HP loss from burns heals this monster instead.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: A small flame that may burn the target.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.description: Erupts with lava. May burn all surrounding monsters.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: Traps the target in a fiery vortex for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restores up to 50% of maximum HP.
